mapper.insert: insert into user(u_id, u_pw, u_cellPhone, u_email, u_gender, u_age) values (#{u_id}, #{u_pw}, #{u_cellPhone}, #{u_email}, #{u_gender}, #{u_age})
mapper.select: select * from goods where g_owner = #{o_sNumber} and g_status = 0
select count(*) from reserve where r_status = 3 and r_u_id = #{u_id}
select count(*) from reserve where r_status = 1 and r_u_id = #{u_id}

select r.r_code, r.r_u_id, r.r_count, r.r_firstTime, r.r_g_code, r.r_status, r.r_customOrder, r.r_pay, g.g_name, g.g_expireDate, g.g_category, g.g_status, g.g_count from reserve as r join goods as g where r.r_u_id = #{r_u_id} and g_code = r.r_g_code group by r.r_code;

select r.r_code, r.r_u_id, r.r_count, r.r_firstTime, r.r_g_code, r.r_status, r.r_customOrder, r.r_pay, g.g_name, g.g_expireDate, g.g_category, g.g_status, g.g_count from reserve as r join goods as g where g.g_category LIKE '%${g_category}%' and g.g_name LIKE '%${searchInput}%' and r.r_u_id = #{r_u_id} and g_code = r.r_g_code group by r.r_code;

select r.r_code, r.r_u_id, r.r_count, r.r_firstTime, r.r_g_code, r.r_status, r.r_customOrder, r.r_pay, g.g_name, g.g_expireDate, g.g_category, g.g_status, g.g_count from reserve as r join goods as g where g.g_category LIKE '%${g_category}%' and r.r_status = #{r_status} and g.g_name LIKE '%${searchInput}%' and r.r_u_id = #{r_u_id} and g_code = r.r_g_code group by r.r_code;
